original_text: Be careful to obey all these commands that I am giving to you. Then you will be doing things that the Lord your God says are good and right. You and your children will enjoy a happy life.
korean_text: 내가 네게 명령하는 이 모든 말을 너는 듣고 지키라 네 하나님 여호와의 목전에 선과 의를 행하면 너와 네 후손에게 영구히 복이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Be careful to obey all these commands
that I am giving to you
Then you will be doing things
that the Lord your God says are good
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 좋다고 말씀하시는 것들

sentences.original_text: You and your children will enjoy
